name: Tech Titans
title: Leading ICT Service Exporters
description: In 2023, Israel's ICT service exports accounted for 61.77% of its total service exports, marking it as a global leader in this sector.

name: Innovative Minds
title: Top R&D Spenders
description: Israel invested 6.02% of its GDP in research and development in 2022, showcasing its commitment to innovation and technological advancement.

name: Educated & Empowered
title: Full Female Secondary School Enrollment
description: In 2015, Israel achieved a 100% net enrollment rate for females in secondary education, reflecting its dedication to gender equality in education.

name: Healthy Lifestyles
title: Low Male Mortality from Major Diseases
description: In 2021, Israel reported a low mortality rate of 8.9% for males aged 30-70 from cardiovascular diseases, cancer, diabetes, or chronic respiratory diseases.
